caption.title: Bipolaris gigantea identification on field-collected leaves.
caption.p: Raw data collected from an experiment at BONWR in which fungicide or water (control) were added to plots with ten planting treatments. Leaves of Microstegium vimineum (Mv) and Elymus virginicus (Ev) were assessed for visible eyespots and B. gigantea conidiophores using microscopy.
Click here for additional data file.
